data.title: Debra Orr - HUNTINGTON, NY Real Estate Agent
data.meta_description: Find real estate agent & Realtor® Debra Orr in HUNTINGTON, NY on realtor.com®, your source for top rated real estate professionals.
data.text:
As a lifelong resident of Long Island, Debra knows that Long Island is an ideal place to live and plant your roots. Born and raised in Huntington, she has spent her life in the heart of Long Island and has extensive knowledge of the area and what our community has to offer. Debra is a seasoned real estate professional with over 15 years of experience helping clients buy and sell their homes on Long Island. Having been a counselor and teacher for over 25 years prior, Debra excels at building trusted relationships and effectively listens and communicates with her clients throughout the process of each search or sale, ensuring a smooth transaction.

Debra is dedicated to her clients and understands that behind every home, there are real people involved. Buying or selling a home is a major decision and can often be a complex and confusing process. Debra prioritizes building strong relationships with her clients to create a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere. She takes the time to understand her client's individual needs and goals and works diligently to provide them with valuable insights and advice from beginning to end. Whether working with first-time buyers or seasoned investors, she strives to make the buying and selling process stress-free and enjoyable.

In her free time, Debra enjoys spending time with her family, boating on the Long Island Sound, and volunteering in her community. As an active member of the community, she stays up to date on the latest industry trends and area happenings and is perfectly situated to help you with your real estate needs.

Education/Designations & Certifications

Licensed Associate Real Estate Broker

Award Winning Agent

Gold Circle of Excellence

Certified Buyers Representative

Senior Real Estate Specialist

Broker Price Opinion Resource

Bachelor of Arts Psychology

Master of Science Education/Counseling

National Certified Counselor
